scripts.democontent: npm run -s teardown-database && sudo rimraf ./database && npm run -s setup-database -- --persistant && sleep 3 && ts-node src/democontent
scripts.test: npm run -s teardown-database && npm run -s setup-database -- --local && npm run -s build && cp ormconfig.test.json dist/ormconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --colors --bail --timeout 60000 --recursive dist/tests && npm run -s teardown-database
scripts.test:ci: npm run -s teardown-database && npm run -s setup-database && npm run -s build && cp ormconfig.test.json dist/ormconfig.json && cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha --colors --bail --timeout 60000 --recursive dist/tests && npm run -s teardown-database

hooks.pre-push: npm run -s lint && npm run -s build && rm -R dist && npm run -s test
